overview: Maryana, a batik designer, conducted research in Singkawang to find original batik motifs from her homeland. He met Wina's friends, who met Hasan, a teacher who eventually became her husband. Their marriage was shaken because of Sarah's phone call asking Hasan for help. Hasan feels bad for Sarah's family who once helped him. This made Maryana misunderstand, especially when there was a call from the hospital saying that Hasan's wife was going to give birth
title: Jejak Cinta
